parameters.name: SOLAR LONGITUDE
parameters.description: Planetocentric longitude of the Sun at the orbit periapsis.

parameters.name: SOLAR LATITUDE
parameters.description: Planetocentric latitude of the Sun at the orbit periapsis.

parameters.name: MGS LONGITUDE
parameters.description: Planetocentric longitude of the spacecraft at the orbit periapsis.

parameters.name: MGS LATITUDE
parameters.description: Planetocentric latitude of the spacecraft at the orbit periapsis.

parameters.name: ALTITUDE
parameters.description: Altitude of the spacecraft at the orbit periapsis.

parameters.name: SOLAR RANGE
parameters.description: Distance from Mars to the Sun at orbit periapsis.
